 Acknowledge amp Apologize 
 When a customer reaches out with a complaint acknowledge their concern immediately Express regret that they re experiencing issues with your product  Show empathy through words or tone of voice Validate their feelings making them feel heard and understood 


 Empathetic responses can go something like this 
Sorry to hear you.re having trouble with our product Can you please tell me more about the issue You-re helping us improve  amp we appreciate your feedback


Gather Information  
After acknowledging their concern gather as much information from the customer as possible Be polite courteous amp friendly This helps identify what went wrong diagnose the problem amp provide relevant support Details such as order numbers batch numbers  product details fault descriptions may come in handy later It.s also essential to clarify expectations on resolving the matter
